pageContext.claim: “Republicans want to protect Medicare for our great seniors who have earned it and who have paid for it all their lives.”
pageContext.analysis: Under Trump, the date for when the Medicare Hospital Insurance (Part A) trust fund will be depleted keeps advancing. The current projection is 2026, three years earlier than the projection a year earlier. If the trust fund is depleted, that means the government would not be able to cover 100 percent of estimated expenses.
